    Sexual Hegemony w/ Max Fox and Chris Nealon

    25 Mar 2023

    Featuring Max Fox and Chris Nealon on the late Christopher Chitty’s book Sexual Hegemony: Statecraft, Sodomy, and Capital in the Rise of the World System.
